mapper.select: select se.store_employee_id, st.store_name, se.employee_no, ( select p.pay_type from pay_tb p where p.store_employee_id = se.store_employee_id order by p.start_date desc, p.pay_id desc limit 1 ) pay_type from store_employee_tb se join store_tb st on st.store_id = se.store_id where se.user_id = #{userId} order by se.store_employee_id desc limit 1
select distinct st.store_id, st.store_name from store_employee_tb se join store_tb st on st.store_id = se.store_id where se.user_id = #{userId} order by st.store_id asc
select st.store_id from store_employee_tb se join store_tb st on st.store_id = se.store_id where se.user_id = #{userId} order by st.store_id asc limit 1

select st.store_id, st.store_name, st.business_number, st.store_phone, st.address,
st.company_type, it.industry_name, st.industry_code from store_tb st join store_employee_tb se on se.store_id = st.store_id left join industry_tb it on it.industry_code = st.industry_code where se.user_id = #{userId} and st.store_id = #{storeId} limit 1
